com.bdt.kiradb

Class FileSystemKiraDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bdt.kiradb.KiraDb
      • com.bdt.kiradb.FileSystemKiraDb

  • public class FileSystemKiraDb
extends KiraDb
    A KiraDb instance that stores objects in the filesystem.
    Author:
    David Beckemeyer and Mark Petrovic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemKiraDb(File indexPath, BackingStore cacheStore, File storePath)
      Construct a Core KiraDB instance with specified indexPath, with user-supplied caching store, and filesystem storage path.
      FileSystemKiraDb(File indexPath, Boolean disableCaching, File storePath)
      Construct a Core KiraDB instance with specified indexPath, with cache mode, and filesystem storage path
      FileSystemKiraDb(File indexPath, File storePath)
      Construct a Core KiraDB instance with specified indexPath and filesystem storage path
